abstract: A longtime state representative throws his support behind Mitt Romney on the eve of a visit to the state by Gov. Rick Perry of Texas.
snippet: A longtime state representative throws his support behind Mitt Romney on the eve of a visit to the state by Gov. Rick Perry of Texas.
lead_paragraph: The campaign of Gov. Rick Perry of Texas was dealt a late-night surprise on the eve of his Friday visit to New Hampshire.

headline.main: New Hampshire Representative Shifts Support to Romney From Perry
